pullRequest.title: Map Editor Fixes - Wave 1
pullRequest.bodyText: This fixes #1641, fixes #1643, fixes a bug found when investigating #1642 relating to building names, fixes a few bugs with exits relating to enforcing the standard bounds and having the check mark selected, and implements some efficiency changes made while investigating #1635.

commit.message: Adding values to hidden localizations to determine their locations
1643: Fixes for localization and in how exits work
1642: changes to improve readability and fixing missing unknownbuilding
1635: Fixes and refactoring when investigating issue
Fixing typos found during personal review
Improved logic to remove if statments
